metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15120 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue has been found in the parsing of authoritative answers in PowerDNS Recursor before 4.0.8, leading to a NULL pointer dereference when parsing a specially crafted answer containing a CNAME of a different class than IN. An unauthenticated remote attacker could cause a denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-15120` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

pdns-recursor - 4.1.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pdns-recursor package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.1-2').
